name: A Wee Tiny Blog
short_description: A Wee Tiny Blog is a little script that you can use to add a blog to an existing site or build a site around. Instead of being a complete website template or system, it's just a little class instance that can be neatly inserted into an existing design.
summary: A small PHP class to add a blog to an existing website
